text:
Hi!
I really want to show a report on Lead Velocity rate (%) for a client of ours.

See HubSpots article for reference: <https://blog.HubSpot.com/sales/the-sales-leaders-key-growth-metric>

What I need is a way of displaying this in a Sales Dashboard based on this formula? IÂ´ve done some research and just want some input from the community, because my way is crazy workaround that feels toooo much :slightly_smiling_face:
